about_the_game:
Get ready to enhance your builds and embark on an epic adventure with the second expansion of the Erannorth Chronicles - "Relics and Armaments". This amazing expansion brings you new equipment options, consumables, and loot that are perfect for mid to high-level characters.

With over 350 new cards, you can recruit unique allies and take advantage of powerful new equipment and deadly consumables that will give you an edge in battle. Face over 100 new enemies, each with their own deadly tactic cards, and survive dangerous encounters that make higher-level campaigns more lethal and challenging.

Discover 35 new quest chains, each with exclusive rewards that you can't get anywhere else in the world. Whether you're exploring new lands or battling fearsome foes, "Relics and Armaments" has everything you need to take your gameplay to the next level.

So, are you ready to enrich your builds and embark on an unforgettable adventure with "Relics and Armaments"? Get ready to take Erannorth to the next level and experience the adventure of a lifetime.
detailed_description:
Disclaimer

DLCs for Erannorth progressively increase the game's complexity and difficulty and aren't recommended to own before you are familiar with the base game. If you try to decide which to get between the available DLCs, I would advise getting them in release order for a smoother transition in difficulty and complexity. So, while any previous DLCs aren't required to enjoy the new content, acquiring them before heading into this one is highly recommended.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 x64bit
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU or better
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Only 16/9 resolutions are supported in full screen.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 x64bit
  • Processor: Quad Core CPU or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX12 (shader model 4.0) capabilities.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Only 16/9 resolutions are supported in full screen.
